title: xspaceship | Why Us
description: We are a team of veterans from the world of Ogilvy & Mather, Collins, Facebook, & Uber to deliver the most unifying, thoughtful and comprehensive creative services.
headline:
Design & build products with our
group of talented product designers, engineers, & art directors

why.headline: The problems we are solving for

feature01.headline: Low quality work
feature01.description: Traditional agencies typically work on simple short-term projects and are not familiar with building complex SaaS products.

feature01.headline: Broken collaboration
feature01.description: Traditional agencies work in silo. You are blind-sided from their progress and frustration builds when the end-result is less than desirable.

feature01.headline: Lacking context
feature01.description: Constantly context-switch leads to teams lacking business context as well as in-depth industry knowledge.

feature02.headline: Long, arduous hiring process
feature02.description: Hiring a full-timer can be a daunting task: vetting the right candidates, figuring out scheduling logistics, the back-and-forth negotiations, the ghosting, and the turn-downs.

feature02.headline: High risk
feature02.description: After months of onboarding and integrating this person into the team, you realized you hired the wrong person.

feature02.headline: High costs
feature02.description: Along with the salary, you will be paying premium for employee benefits.

what.headline: Our embedded model is the solution

feature.headline: An all-star team
feature.description: Our design and engineering leads have stellar track-record designing and building world-class products at Uber and Meta.

feature.headline: Fully embedded
feature.description: Our team integrates into your team seamlessly for smooth collaboration.

feature.headline: Diverse talents
feature.description: Leverage our talent pools in product design, brand design, and engineering  to fulfill your product needs without having to hire or pay more.

feature.headline: Risk-free
feature.description: Your needs changed? No worries, with a short-term notice we will help you wrap up and hand off the projects.

feature.headline: Long-term Partnership
feature.description: We will spend time building industry knowledge, and deeply empathizing with your user problems.
